cont.entity_a: VPN connections between locations are unreliable, often dropping and requiring restarts. Not compatible with some VPN clients and software. Works well for site-to-site VPN connections.
cont.entity_b: Wireless N devices cannot connect. Wireless connection drops frequently and requires resets.

cont.entity_a: Router sometimes locks up. DHCP sometimes hangs, requiring restarts. Some units have power supply issues.
cont.entity_b: Router often needs rebooting due to USB hard drive issues.

cont.entity_a: Firmware can be updated. Firmware issues cause VPN connection drops and web page problems.
cont.entity_b: DD-WRT firmware enhances capabilities but carries risk. Firmware issues lead to NAT and wireless connection problems. Firmware upgrade necessary for improved performance. Firmware discontinuation by Linksys limits support.

cont.entity_a: Load balancing does not work well with secure connections like iTunes downloads. Unreliable when using both WAN connections simultaneously.
cont.entity_b: Good range and performance when functional. Gigabit LAN unable to handle large file transfers. Router is fast and eliminates dead spots in wireless coverage.

cont.entity_a: Requires a knowledgeable user for setup and maintenance.
cont.entity_b: Setup wizard does not work with Windows XP. Setup is straightforward, but storage link documentation is lacking.

cont.entity_a: Router gets hot and requires proper ventilation.
cont.entity_b: Less range compared to older Netgear Wireless-G router. Range is comparable to older G routers.

cont.entity_a: Dual WAN option works, but load balancing is unreliable if ISPs are unstable. Remote access is possible and works reliably. Good for smaller installations with a user-friendly web interface. Port forwarding has limitations, such as not being able to redirect ports. Not suitable for VoIP systems due to random port closures. Solid and reliable for small businesses with many features.
cont.entity_b: Highly configurable and works well once set up. Good for casual internet use but not advanced features. USB storage feature is unreliable.

Port Forwarding.comm: Router locks up when opening ports for forwarding.

cont.entity_a: Port forwarding has limitations, such as not being able to redirect ports.
